Class AbstractProcessManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • review.classdesign.jammy.addons.AbstractProcessManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILanguageManager
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PythonManager

    public abstract class AbstractProcessManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements ILanguageManager
    Abstract ILanguageManager implementation tat aims to run solver through Process instance.

    fv
